languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}По приказу Вольного Торговца{/d} мы отдали на растерзание ксеносам Веабос-6, чтобы у друкари не возникло лишних подозрений о наших чрезмерных успехах. По этим же причинам мы позволили им напасть на мир-столицу — надеялись отрезать дракону голову, но... ничего не вышло. Дракон оказался хитрей и проворней".

traits.locale_text: "По приказу Вольного Торговца мы отдали на растерзание ксеносам Веабос-6, чтобы у друкари не возникло лишних подозрений о наших чрезмерных успехах. По этим же причинам мы позволили им напасть на мир-столицу — надеялись отрезать дракону голову, но... ничего не вышло. Дракон оказался хитрей и проворней".

languages.text: "We surrendered Vheabos VI to the depredations of the xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}on the Rogue Trader's orders{/d} so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}По приказу Вольного Торговца{/d} мы отдали на растерзание ксеносам Веабос-6, чтобы у друкари не возникло лишних подозрений о наших чрезмерных успехах. По этим же причинам мы позволили им напасть на мир-столицу — надеялись отрезать дракону голову, но... ничего не вышло. Дракон оказался хитрей и проворней".

traits.locale_text: "We surrendered Vheabos-VI to the depredations of the xenos on the Rogue Trader's orders so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

"We surrendered Vheabos-VI to the depredations of the xenos on the Rogue Trader's orders so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

"We surrendered Vheabos-VI to the depredations of the xenos on the Rogue Trader's orders so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

"We surrendered Vheabos-VI to the depredations of the xenos on the Rogue Trader's orders so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

"We surrendered Vheabos VI to the depredations of the xenos on the Rogue Trader's orders so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

"We surrendered Vheabos VI to the depredations of the xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}on the Rogue Trader's orders{/d} so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

"We surrendered Vheabos VI to the depredations of the xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}on the Rogue Trader's orders{/d} so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

languages.text: « Nous avons livré Vhéabos-VI aux exactions des xénos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}{/d} afin de ne pas éveiller les soupçons des Drukharis quant à notre insolente réussite. Nous les avons laissés attaquer le monde-capitale pour la même raison, en espérant pouvoir couper la tête du Dracon... Mais nous avons échoué. Le dracon s'est montré trop habile et rusé. »
languages.original_text: "We surrendered Vheabos VI to the depredations of the xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}on the Rogue Trader's orders{/d} so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons livré Vhéabos-VI aux exactions des xénos sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} afin de ne pas éveiller les soupçons des Drukharis quant à notre insolente réussite. Nous les avons laissés attaquer le monde capitale pour la même raison, en espérant pouvoir couper la tête du Dracon... Mais nous avons échoué. Le dracon s'est montré trop habile et rusé. »

languages.text: “我们按照{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}行商浪人的命令{/d}，任由异形掠夺维博斯六号星，这样那些黑暗灵族就不会继续怀疑下去。我们允许他们袭击我们的首都世界，也是出于同样的原因。我们本打算借这个机会杀死裁决官……但我们失败了，裁决官实在是太狡猾、太敏锐了。”
languages.original_text: "We surrendered Vheabos VI to the depredations of the xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}on the Rogue Trader's orders{/d} so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

traits.locale_text: “我们按照行商浪人的命令，任由异形掠夺维博斯六号星，这样那些黑暗灵族就不会继续怀疑下去。我们允许他们袭击我们的首都世界，也是出于同样的原因。我们本打算借这个机会杀死裁决官……但我们失败了，裁决官实在是太狡猾、太敏锐了。”

languages.text: 「我々は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}自由開拓者の命令{/d}でヴィアボス・VIを異種族の略奪対象として明け渡しました。そうすることで、デュカーリが我々の継続的な成功に対し、余計な疑念を抱かせないようにしたのです。同じ理由で首都惑星も攻撃させ、ドラコンの首を落とさせようとしましたが…それには失敗しました。ドラコンがあまりに機敏で狡猾だったからです」
languages.original_text: "We surrendered Vheabos VI to the depredations of the xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}on the Rogue Trader's orders{/d} so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}自由開拓者の命令{/d}でヴィアボス・VIを異種族の略奪対象として明け渡しました。そうすることで、デュカーリが我々の継続的な成功に対し、余計な疑念を抱かせないようにしたのです。同じ理由で首都惑星も攻撃させ、ドラコンの首を落とさせようとしましたが…それには失敗しました。ドラコンがあまりに機敏で狡猾だったからです」

languages.text: "Wir haben den Xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}{/d} Vheabos-VI überlassen, damit bei den Drukhari kein unnötiger Verdacht über unseren anhaltenden Erfolg aufkommen würde. Aus demselben Grund ließen wir zu, dass sie die Hauptwelt angreifen konnten. Wir hatten die Hoffnung, dem Dracon den Kopf abschlagen zu können ... Aber wir scheiterten. Der Dracon war zu geschwind und zu gerissen."
languages.original_text: "We surrendered Vheabos VI to the depredations of the xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}on the Rogue Trader's orders{/d} so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben den Xenos auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} Vheabos-VI überlassen, damit bei den Drukhari kein unnötiger Verdacht über unseren anhaltenden Erfolg aufkommen würde. Aus demselben Grund ließen wir zu, dass sie die Hauptwelt angreifen konnten. Wir hatten die Hoffnung, dem Dracon den Kopf abschlagen zu können ... Aber wir scheiterten. Der Dracon war zu geschwind und zu gerissen."

languages.text: «Rendimos Vheabos VI a la crueldad de los xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}por orden {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente{/d} para que los Drukhari no sospechasen de nuestros continuos éxitos. Les dejamos atacar el mundo capital por el mismo motivo, con la esperanza de decapitar al dracón... pero fracasamos. El dracón fue demasiado rápido y demasiado astuto».
languages.original_text: "We surrendered Vheabos VI to the depredations of the xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}on the Rogue Trader's orders{/d} so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

traits.locale_text: «Rendimos Vheabos-VI a la crueldad de los xenos por orden {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente para que los Drukhari no sospechasen de nuestros continuos éxitos. Les dejamos atacar el mundo capital por el mismo motivo, con la esperanza de decapitar al dracón... pero fracasamos. El dracón fue demasiado rápido y demasiado astuto».

languages.text: "Drukhariler devamlı olarak elde ettiğimiz başarılardan şüphelenmesin diye Vheabos VI'yı {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}Hür Tacir'in emirleriyle{/d} zeno saldırılarına açık bıraktık. Başdünyaya saldırmalarına da aynı sebeple izin verdik. Amacımız Drakon'un başını kesmekti ancak başarısız olduk. Drakon, fazlasıyla çevik ve kurnaz çıktı."
languages.original_text: "We surrendered Vheabos VI to the depredations of the xenos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_IsItTrue}on the Rogue Trader's orders{/d} so the Drukhari would not have any unnecessary suspicions about our continuing success. We let them attack the capital world for the same reason, hoping to cut off the Dracon's head... But we failed. The Dracon was too swift and too cunning."

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos VI'yı Hür Tacir'in emirleriyle zeno saldırılarına açık hâlde bıraktık ki Drukhariler devamlı olarak elde ettiğimiz başarılardan şüphelenmesin. Başdünyaya saldırmalarına da aynı sebeple izin verdik. Amacımız Drakon'un başını kesmekti ancak başarısız olduk. Drakon fazlasıyla çevik ve fazlasıyla kurnaz çıktı."
